00042 class SMDQMSourceExample : public edm::EDAnalyzer {
00043 public:
00044    explicit SMDQMSourceExample( const edm::ParameterSet& );
00045    ~SMDQMSourceExample();
00046    
00047   virtual void analyze( const edm::Event&, const edm::EventSetup& );
00048 
00049   virtual void beginJob( const edm::EventSetup& );
00050 
00051   virtual void endJob(void);
00052 
00053   void beginRun(edm::Run const& run, edm::EventSetup const& eSetup);
00054   void endLuminosityBlock(edm::LuminosityBlock const& lumiSeg,
00055                           edm::EventSetup const& eSetup);
00056   void endRun(edm::Run const& run, edm::EventSetup const& eSetup);
00057 
00058 private:
00059       // ----------member data ---------------------------
00060 
00061   MonitorElement * h1;
00062   MonitorElement * h2;
00063   MonitorElement * h3;
00064   MonitorElement * h4;
00065   MonitorElement * h5;
00066   MonitorElement * h6;
00067   MonitorElement * h7;
00068   MonitorElement * h8;
00069   MonitorElement * h9;
00070   MonitorElement * i1;
00071   MonitorElement * f1;
00072   MonitorElement * s1;
00073   float XMIN; float XMAX;
00074   // event counter
00075   int counter;
00076   // back-end interface
00077   DQMStore * dbe;
00078 };
00079 
00080 SMDQMSourceExample::SMDQMSourceExample( const edm::ParameterSet& iConfig )
00081   : counter(0)
00082 {
00083   // get hold of back-end interface
00084   dbe = edm::Service<DQMStore>().operator->();
00085   
00086   const int NBINS = 500; XMIN = 0; XMAX = 50;
00087 
00088   // book some histograms here
00089 
00090   // create and cd into new folder
00091   dbe->setCurrentFolder("C1");
00092   h1 = dbe->book1D("histo", "Example 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00093   h2 = dbe->book2D("histo2", "Example 2 2D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX, 
00094        NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00095   // create and cd into new folder
00096   dbe->setCurrentFolder("C1/C2");
00097   h3 = dbe->book1D("histo3", "Example 3 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00098   h4 = dbe->book1D("histo4", "Example 4 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00099   h5 = dbe->book1D("histo5", "Example 5 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00100   h6 = dbe->book1D("histo6", "Example 6 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00101   // create and cd into new folder
00102   dbe->setCurrentFolder("C1/C3");
00103   const int NBINS2 = 10;
00104   h7 = dbe->book1D("histo7", "Example 7 1D histogram.", NBINS2, XMIN, XMAX);
00105   char temp[1024];
00106   for(int i = 1; i <= NBINS2; ++i)
00107     {
00108       sprintf(temp, " bin no. %d", i);
00109       h7->setBinLabel(i, temp);
00110     }
00111   i1 = dbe->bookInt("int1");
00112   f1 = dbe->bookFloat("float1");
00113   s1 = dbe->bookString("s1", "my string");
00114 
00115   // create and cd into a new top level folder
00116   dbe->setCurrentFolder("D1");
00117   h8 = dbe->book1D("histo8", "Example 8 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00118   // create and cd into new sublevel folder
00119   dbe->setCurrentFolder("D1/D2");
00120   h9 = dbe->book2D("histo9", "Example 9 2D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX, 
00121        NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00122 
00123   h2->setAxisTitle("Customized x-axis", 1);
00124   h2->setAxisTitle("Customized y-axis", 2);
00125 
00126   // assign tag to MEs h1, h2 and h7
00127   const unsigned int detector_id = 17;
00128   dbe->tag(h1, detector_id);
00129   dbe->tag(h2, detector_id);
00130   dbe->tag(h7, detector_id);
00131   // tag full directory
00132   dbe->tagContents("C1/C3", detector_id);
00133 
00134   // assign tag to MEs h4 and h6
00135   const unsigned int detector_id2 = 25;
00136   const unsigned int detector_id3 = 50;
00137   dbe->tag(h4, detector_id2);
00138   dbe->tag(h6, detector_id3);
00139 
00140   // contents of h5 & h6 will be reset at end of monitoring cycle
00141   h5->setResetMe(true);
00142   h6->setResetMe(true);
00143   dbe->showDirStructure();
00144 }

00157 void SMDQMSourceExample::beginJob(const edm::EventSetup& iSetup)
00158 {
00159   std::cout << "SMDQMSourceExample: "
00160             << "Doing beginning of job processing." << std::endl;
00161 }
00162 
00163 void SMDQMSourceExample::endJob(void)
00164 {
00165   std::cout << "SMDQMSourceExample: "
00166             << "Doing end of job processing." << std::endl;
00167   dbe->save("test.root");  
00168   dbe->rmdir("C1");
00169   dbe->rmdir("D1");
00170 }

00172 void SMDQMSourceExample::beginRun(edm::Run const& run, edm::EventSetup const& eSetup)
00173 {
00174   std::cout << "SMDQMSourceExample: "
00175             << "Doing beginning of run processing for run number "
00176             <<  run.run() << std::endl;
00177 }
00178 
00179 void SMDQMSourceExample::endLuminosityBlock(edm::LuminosityBlock const& lumiSeg,
00180                                             edm::EventSetup const& eSetup)
00181 {
00182   std::cout << "SMDQMSourceExample: "
00183             << "Doing end of lumi processing for lumi number "
00184             << lumiSeg.luminosityBlock() << " of run "
00185             << lumiSeg.run() << std::endl;
00186 }
00187 
00188 void SMDQMSourceExample::endRun(edm::Run const& run, edm::EventSetup const& eSetup)
00189 {
00190   std::cout << "SMDQMSourceExample: "
00191             << "Doing end of run processing for run number "
00192             <<  run.run() << std::endl;
00193   h1->Reset();
00194   h2->Reset();
00195   h3->Reset();
00196   h4->Reset();
00197   h5->Reset();
00198   h6->Reset();
00199   h7->Reset();
00200   h8->Reset();
00201   h9->Reset();
00202   //dbe->rmdir("C1");
00203   //dbe->rmdir("D1");
00204 }

00206 //
00207 // member functions
00208 //
00209 
00210 // ------------ method called to produce the data  ------------
00211 void SMDQMSourceExample::analyze(const edm::Event& iEvent, 
00212              const edm::EventSetup& iSetup )
00213 {   
00214   i1->Fill(gRandom->Integer(static_cast<int>(XMAX)));
00215   f1->Fill(-3.14);
00216  
00217    // Filling the histogram with random data
00218   srand( 0 );
00219 
00220   if(counter%1000 == 0)
00221     cout << " # of cycles = " << counter << endl;
00222 
00223   for(int i = 0; i != 20; ++i ) 
00224     {
00225       float x = gRandom->Uniform(XMAX);
00226       h1->Fill(x,1./log(x+1));
00227       h3->Fill(x, 1);
00228       h4->Fill(gRandom->Gaus(30, 3), 1.0);
00229       h5->Fill(gRandom->Poisson(15), 0.5);
00230       h6->Fill(gRandom->Gaus(25, 15), 1.0);
00231       h7->Fill(gRandom->Gaus(25, 8), 1.0);
00232       h8->Fill(gRandom->Gaus(25, 7), 1.0);
00233     }
00234 
00235   // fit h4 to gaussian
00236   h4->getTH1F()->Fit("gaus","Q");
00237   
00238   for ( int i = 0; i != 10; ++i ) 
00239     {
00240       float x = gRandom->Gaus(15, 7);
00241       float y = gRandom->Gaus(20, 5);
00242       h2->Fill(x,y);
00243       h9->Fill(x,y);
00244     }
00245 
00246   ++counter;
00247 }
00248 
00249 //define this as a plug-in
00250 DEFINE_FWK_MODULE(SMDQMSourceExample);
